data.name: AddOrUpdate
data.value: UNWIND {word} as WordParam MERGE (newWord: Word {number: WordParam.number}) ON CREATE SET newWord = WordParam, newWord.uuid = randomUUID() ON MATCH SET newWord = WordParam

data.name: GetWord
data.value: MATCH (word: Word {expression: $expression}) return word as Word

data.name: AddText
data.value: UNWIND $text as nText CREATE (newText: Text) SET newText = nText, newText.uuid = randomUUID() WITH newText WITH newText, apoc.text.split(newText.content, "[ |;|!|?|.|:]") as newExpressionList UNWIND newExpressionList as newExpression MERGE (w:Word {expression: newExpression}) MERGE (newText)-[r:HAS_WORD]->(w) ON CREATE SET r.count = 1 ON MATCH SET r.count = r.count + 1 RETURN DISTINCT newText.uuid as textUuid

data.name: GetText
data.value: MATCH (text: Text {uuid: $textUuid}) return text as Text

data.name: MakeTextLearned
data.value: MATCH (user: User {uuid:$userUuid}) MATCH (text: Text {uuid:$textUuid}) WITH user, text MATCH (text)-[:HAS_WORD]->(word: Word) MERGE (user)-[:LEARNED]->(word) RETURN DISTINCT user.uuid

data.name: AddUser
data.value: UNWIND $user as user CREATE (newUser: User) SET newUser = user, newUser.uuid = randomUUID(), newUser.created = timestamp() RETURN newUser.uuid as userUuid

data.name: GetUser
data.value: MATCH (user: User {uuid: $userUuid}) RETURN user{.*} as user

data.name: GetUserByEmail
data.value: MATCH (user: User {email: $email}) RETURN user{.*} as user

data.name: AddOrUpdateCard
data.value:
UNWIND {cards} as CardParam MERGE (card: Card {cardId: CardParam.cardId}) ON CREATE SET card = CardParam, card.uuid = randomUUID() ON MATCH SET card = CardParam
MERGE (word:Word {expression: CardParam.keyword}) MERGE (card)-[r:HAS_WORD]->(word)
MERGE (user: User {email: $userEmail}) MERGE (user)-[hasCard:HAS_CARD]->(card) SET hasCard.factor = CardParam.factor, hasCard.interval = CardParam.interval, hasCard.note = CardParam.note, hasCard.type = CardParam.type, hasCard.queue = CardParam.queue, hasCard.due = CardParam.due, hasCard.reps = CardParam.reps, hasCard.lapses = CardParam.lapses, hasCard.left = CardParam.left
RETURN collect(card.uuid) AS cardUuidList, true as res

data.name: GetCardByCardId
data.value: MATCH (card: Card {cardId: $cardId}) RETURN card{.*} as card
